text: Robert III (1337 - 4 April 1406) was the second King of Scotland from the House of Stuart, ruling from 1390 following the death of his father Robert II of Scotland till his own death in 1406 after 16 years as king. Category:Kings and Queens of Scotland Category:1340s births Category:1406 deaths Category:14th century in Scotland Category:15th century in Scotland
title: Robert III of Scotland
